item.title: [317]Adding Custom OBJECTS Help (Class46.java)[317]
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote]317…Client8.java? It’s Class8.java, and that’s for Custom ITEMS, Class46.java is for Custom OBJECTS.

Couldn’t have said it better[/quote]

Lol, there aren’t any Custom Objects added to Class46.java, and I’m a bit foolish about those, so I have NO IDEA where to add them in Class46.java…Please help me.
